org.antfarmer.ejce.password

Interface PasswordEncoderAdapter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConfigurablePasswordEncoder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractArgon2PasswordEncoder, AbstractBcryptPasswordEncoder, AbstractConfigurablePasswordEncoder, AbstractPbkdf2PasswordEncoder, AbstractScryptPasswordEncoder, Argon2JvmEncoder, BcBcryptEncoder, BcScryptEncoder, Pbkdf2Encoder, SpringBcryptEncoder, SpringPbkdf2Encoder, SpringScryptEncoder

    public interface PasswordEncoderAdapter
    Adapter interface for password encoders to be used for the encoded password Hibernate type.
    See Also:
    EncodedPasswordType

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String encode(CharSequence rawPassword)
      Encode the raw password.
      boolean matches(CharSequence rawPassword, String encodedPassword)
      Verify the encoded password obtained from storage matches the submitted raw password after it too is encoded.

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        String encode(CharSequence rawPassword)
        Encode the raw password. This should combine a message digest (hash) function with randomly generated salt.

      • matches

        boolean matches(CharSequence rawPassword,
                String encodedPassword)
        Verify the encoded password obtained from storage matches the submitted raw password after it too is encoded. Returns true if the passwords match, false if they do not. The stored password itself is never decoded.
        Parameters:
        rawPassword - the raw password to encode and match
        encodedPassword - the encoded password from storage to compare with
        Returns:
        true if the raw password, after encoding, matches the encoded password from storage
